title: Leader of a Club but not a member. Need to be re-joined
body:
Hey guys,

As the title says.
I made a club ages ago and I've somehow been removed from it, while all my friends are still in it.
But it still says I am the leader/owner whatever.

Just looking on help getting back into the club.

Cheers.

replies.body:
Submit a ticket top player support, since it's account specific it's not something we can help with on boards :)

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
